description:
A modern, maintained replacement for ls, built on exa.

eza is a modern, maintained replacement for the venerable file-listing
command-line program ls that ships with Unix and Linux operating systems,
giving it more features and better defaults.

It uses colours to distinguish file types and metadata.
It knows about symlinks, extended attributes, and Git.
And it's small, fast, and just one single binary
Bug Fixes
- Remove non_alpha from percent encoding to fix hyprlinks
Features
- Pass from serde_yaml to serde_norway
Miscellaneous Tasks
- Eza v0.19.4 changelogs, version bump
